data.name: Irrelevant
data.detailed_description:
FIGHT TO GET BETTER.

Choose one of the characters. Each character has unique skills and fighting styles that improve with experience. Combine the characters' skills with found artifacts to gain new ways to effectively destroy hordes of monsters.

FIGHT TO RECLAIM THE HEART OF THE UNIVERSE.

The Heart of the Universe has been stolen by powerful forces. Your task is to go to an unknown galaxy, find the heart and return it to its proper place, but everything is not so simple... The heart was hidden in a quantum cage, the keys to which are kept by the ancient Sirens.

THE UNIQUE TOTEM SYSTEM.

While searching, you will have to visit dozens of manually created locations. To move between them, a system of totems was developed, each containing a set of challenges. Complete all the challenges of the totems to open your way further.

A HUGE AMOUNT OF PICKUPS.

There are over a hundred different items in the game: modifiers, artifacts, structural changes, amulets, cursed signatures, runes of Creation. They can be purchased in special obelisks, and each of them, in one way or another, changes the gameplay. Each run in this action rogue-lite is unique.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe in the center of a hostile galaxy. Destroy hordes of monsters using combinations of found artifacts. Find the quantum cage and open it using the keys collected from the ancient Sirens. Only the Creators can compete with you in power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
